en.bdb: Praises of Waheguru, the wondrous Lord

verse.gurmukhi: lK Acrj Acrj hoie Acrj hYrwxw[
verse.unicode: ਲਖ ਅਚਰਜ ਅਚਰਜ ਹੋਇ ਅਚਰਜ ਹੈਰਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: Beholding the wondrous Lord myriad’s of wonders become full of wonder.

transliteration.english: lakh acharaj acharaj hoi acharaj hairaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: लख अचरज अचरज होइ अचरज हैराणा।
transliteration.en: lakh acharaj acharaj hoi acharaj hairaanaa|
transliteration.hi: लख अचरज अचरज होइ अचरज हैराणा।
transliteration.ipa: ləkʰ ət͡ʃərəd͡ʒ ət͡ʃərəd͡ʒ hɔeɪ ət͡ʃərəd͡ʒ hærɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: لکھ اچرج اچرج هوا اچرج هَےراݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: ivsmu hoie ivsmwd lK lK coj ivfwxw[
verse.unicode: ਵਿਸਮੁ ਹੋਇ ਵਿਸਮਾਦ ਲਖ ਲਖ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: Seeing his wonderful deeds, the elation itself becomes elated.

transliteration.english: visam hoi visamaadh lakh lakh choj viddaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: विसमु होइ विसमाद लख लख चोज विडाणा।
transliteration.en: visam hoi visamaadh lakh lakh choj viddaanaa|
transliteration.hi: विसमु होइ विसमाद लख लख चोज विडाणा।
transliteration.ipa: ʋɪsəm hɔeɪ ʋɪsəmɑd̪ ləkʰ ləkʰ t͡ʃɔd͡ʒ ʋɪɖɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: وِسم هوا وسماد لکھ لکھ چوج وڈاݨا۔

en.bdb: Realising his marvellous Order many uncanny arrangements feel themselves full of wonder.

verse.gurmukhi: Aibgiq giq AgwD boD AprMpru bwxw[
verse.unicode: ਅਬਿਗਤਿ ਗਤਿ ਅਗਾਧ ਬੋਧ ਅਪਰੰਪਰੁ ਬਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: His unmanifest position is unknowable and His form and guise is formless.

transliteration.english: abigat gat agaadh bodh apara(n)par baanaa|
transliteration.hindi: अबिगति गति अगाध बोध अपरंपरु बाणा।
transliteration.en: abigat gat agaadh bodh apara(n)par baanaa|
transliteration.hi: अबिगति गति अगाध बोध अपरंपरु बाणा।
transliteration.ipa: əbɪGət̪ Gət̪ əGɑt̪ə̀ bɔt̪ə̀ əpərəŋpər bɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: ابگت گتِ اگادھ بودھ اپرمپر باݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: AkQ kQw Ajpw jpxu nyiq nyiq vKwxw[
verse.unicode: ਅਕਥ ਕਥਾ ਅਜਪਾ ਜਪਣੁ ਨੇਤਿ ਨੇਤਿ ਵਖਾਣਾ।

en.bdb: His tale is ineffable; unrecited recitations are performed for Him but even He is described as neti neti(not this not that).

transliteration.english: akath kathaa ajapaa japan net net vakhaanaa|
transliteration.hindi: अकथ कथा अजपा जपणु नेति नेति वखाणा।
transliteration.en: akath kathaa ajapaa japan net net vakhaanaa|
transliteration.hi: अकथ कथा अजपा जपणु नेति नेति वखाणा।
transliteration.ipa: əkət̪ʰ kət̪ʰɑ əd͡ʒəpɑ d͡ʒəpəɳ net̪ net̪ ʋəkʰɑɳɑ.
transliteration.ur: اکتھ کتھا اجپا جپݨ نےت نےت وکھاݨا۔

verse.gurmukhi: Awid purK Awdysu hY kudriq kurbwxw ]24]
verse.unicode: ਆਦਿ ਪੁਰਖ ਆਦੇਸੁ ਹੈ ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਕੁਰਬਾਣਾ ॥੨੪॥

en.bdb: I salute that primal Lord and I am sacrifice unto His feats.

transliteration.english: aadh purakh aadhes hai kudharat kurabaanaa ||24||
transliteration.hindi: आदि पुरख आदेसु है कुदरति कुरबाणा ॥२४॥
transliteration.en: aadh purakh aadhes hai kudharat kurabaanaa ||24||
transliteration.hi: आदि पुरख आदेसु है कुदरति कुरबाणा ॥२४॥
transliteration.ipa: əɑd̪ pʊrəkʰ əɑd̪es hæ kʊd̪ərət̪ kʊrəbɑɳɑ.2ə4.
transliteration.ur: آد پُرکھ آدےس هَے کُدرت کُرباݨا ۔۔۲۴۔۔
